metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0216 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The My Home implementation in the block_html_pluginfile function inblocks/html/lib.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.10, 2.5.xbefore 2.5.6, and 2.6.x before 2.6.3 does not properly restrict fileaccess, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information byvisiting an HTML block.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.5+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: moodle package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5+dfsg-1').
